nodes.text: The Hanna City opera house was a building in Chandrila's capital, Hanna City. In 5 ABY, the Imperial agent Windom Traducier installed a transponder at the top of the opera house that was used by Fleet Admiral Gallius Rax to activate mind behavioral modification biochips that had been implanted inside the heads of former Ashmead's Lock prisoners. As a result, the prisoners attacked New Republic officials and military officers during the Liberation Day attacks.
